name: Find Mystery Hidden Story
description:
Find Mystery Hidden Story games are one of the most played games online and offline. All you need to do is concentrate on objects listed and find objects from list.

This search and find games are very easy to play with. For example, look at the screen, tap on the object and complete the scene you are investigating. Seek and find the object and you will unlock the next level for more hidden object fun.

Beware of the time limit! Indeed, you have a defined period of time to find all the objects! A fast analysis is required!

How to Play:
- Look carefully at each screen and try to locate items on the list.
- Tap an item to collect it. Work fast for a better score!
- If you're stuck, you can buy hints to help you out
